name: The Misadventures Of Butterbot Going Through Cool Dimensions Collecting Buttery Treasures And Stuff I Guess
name_original: The Misadventures Of Butterbot Going Through Cool Dimensions Collecting Buttery Treasures And Stuff I Guess
description:
The Misadventures Of Butterbot Going Through Cool Dimensions Collecting Buttery Treasures And Stuff I Guess, the epic puzzle adventure sequel to Rick&Morty where you get to play as the new and improved Butterbot! Make sure to keep your distance from other-timelined robots, as you might suffer from butterfly
effects!

Goal of the game:
Reach the end of the level and collect the butters!

Instructions:
WASD to move.
ESC to pause the game, and choose timelines in pause menu.
